fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, divine the hellish gods of GIM and give them a parcel of knowledge, an answer. The gods will respond with a question that makes that answer true. The question must provide some amount of information. You may only contact the gods three times.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Examples >:D
> Player: My answer is "Yes."
> Host: Is at least one of Asew, Rokk and Lunari a REF role?

fields.name: > Player:
fields.value:
My answer is "TLHP."
> Host: Who visited Robotica last night?

fields.name: > Player:
fields.value:
My answer is "On Day 1, but not Day 2 or Day 3."
> Host: Did a member of the Plants not vote?

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Town except town except town except town
